description:
Explore a Variety of Short Dramas on Melolo for Free! Experience captivating stories featuring romance, revenge, and fantasy plots that cater to your entertainment needs.
We have tons of the latest short dramas available on Melolo! You'll find something to love here, no matter what genre you enjoy. Join us on Melolo for short drama entertainment!
Discover Melolo with:
- Enjoy unlimited Short Dramas: Explore and watch a selection of captivating short dramas. Offering you an endless stream of entertainment and storytelling experiences.
- A World of Genres: We offer a diverse range of short video content to suit every mood and preference. From passionate romances and thrilling suspense to heart-wrenching tragedies and tales of revenge, there's something for everyone.
- Exclusive Original Content: Discover exclusive original short dramas that will transport you to unique worlds and leave you wanting more.
- Popular Drama Recommendation: We curate a diverse collection of popular dramas to enrich your viewing experience, so you can discover captivating stories you'll love.
- Watch Anytime, Anywhere: Whether you're commuting, relaxing, or simply taking a break, our app makes it easy to enjoy short dramas on your schedule.
- Immersive Viewing Experience: Experience crystal-clear HD visuals, built-in subtitles, and automatic full-screen mode for a truly immersive viewing experience.
- Fresh Stories Every Time: We regularly update our content library, ensuring a constant stream of fresh and exciting short dramas to keep you entertained.

Dive into ShortMax, the prime video app for short dramas, movies, and reels! Perfect for quick breaks, commutes, or late-night binge sessions, our app delivers engaging stories in minutes.
Step into the realm of ShortMax, where an array of engaging short dramas and movies awaits your exploration. Immerse yourself in a diverse range of episodes and elevate your drama experience to new heights.
Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With ShortMax, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!
Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.
Unveiling Exclusive Selection
ShortMax proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.
Here's What Awaits You on ShortMax:
- An Array of Genres
From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, ShortMax caters to every drama preference you desire.
- Tailored Recommendations
Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.
- Effortless Viewing Experience
With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.
- Exclusive Original Content
Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!
- Always Fresh
Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!
- Offline Download
Enjoy your downloaded content anytime, anywhere, even when you're offline.
- Your One-Stop Platform
ShortMax simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.
- Visual Brilliance
Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.
Embrace ShortMax as your gateway to the world of short dramas and movies, where limitless possibilities await. Download now and embark on an exhilarating journey through a universe of captivating short dramas, immersing yourself in the drama-watching experience!
Notice：

Your subscription will automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the current period ends. The renewal fee will be charged to your account within 24 hours of the end of the current period, at the price of the selected plan. You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings at any time in your account settings.
Since your payment was processed through a third-party platform, if you wish to request a refund or cancel your subscription, please contact your original payment channel, as we do not have the authority to cancel subscriptions on your behalf.

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

Vidio – All Your Favorite Shows in One Place

The most complete watching app is only on Vidio! From live sports and highlights, Vidio Original Series, to your favorite movies, dramas, and anime, everything is in one app. Enjoy exciting streaming anytime, anywhere!

· Live Sports & Leagues – Watch thrilling matches like the Premier League, BRI Liga 1, UCL, Serie A, NBA, MotoGP, F1, and many more.
· Vidio Originals – Enjoy exclusive shows of various genres like Bad Guys, Santri Pilihan Bunda 2, True Stalker, and Scandal 3: The Final & Sexiest.
· Korean Drama – Watch popular K-dramas like Love Scout, Motel California, The Queen Who Crowns, and Study Group.
· Top Movies & Drama – Watch the best movies and dramas, from Azzamine (Indonesian film), Flourished Peony (Mandarin drama), to Escape (Korean action film).
· Latest and Popular Anime – Watch your favorite anime like Solo Leveling Season 2: Arise from the Shadow and Naruto: Shippuden.
· TV Channels – Watch live national and international TV, starting from SCTV, Indosiar, tvN, Arirang, to Aljazeera.
· Sports Channels – Access various top sports channels like BeIN Sports, SPOTV, and Champions TV.
· Explore also Thai dramas, Japanese dramas, music, online radio, and much more!

Enjoy seamless HD streaming, subtitles in various languages, and ad-free viewing now!

To get the best experience, Vidio requires internet connection via WiFi or data package from your telecommunication provider (not included in Vidio subscription package). Internet quota consumption will determine by duration of content consumed.

Subscription via Vidio app
To subscribe, you can simply follow below easy steps:
1. Tap profile icon on the right corner
2. Tap Subscription
3. Select your preferred plan by tapping Activate
4. Sign in to your account (if you are not signed in). Vidio account is different from Apple ID
5. Tap Confirm button after entering your Apple ID password
6. Fill out any required payment information
7. Congratulations! Your Vidio account has been upgraded to Vidio Premier
 
If you are are subscribed using credit card, your subscription will automatically renew 24 hours prior to the end of each subscription period and will be charged through your iTunes account.
You can also cancel your Vidio Premier subscription anytime by managing your subscriptions "Manage Subscriptions" in the Apple Appstore. To cancel, please follow the instructions at https://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098. Cancellations in the middle of the active period will become effective as of the next billing cycle.There will be no refunds nor credit for partial subscription periods.
 
Terms of use - https://www.vidio.com/pages/premier-terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy - https://www.vidio.com/pages/privacy-policy
For questions & feedback, please drop an email to info@vidio.com

Entertainment your way, stream anytime and anywhere with Vidio!

Looking for something to watch during your daily commute, lunch break, or just to unwind after a long day? Look no further than our Dramabox!
With our app, you can access a huge selection of high-quality content from some of the best creators out there. From indie films to award-winning TV series, we've got something for everyone. And with new content added regularly, you'll always have something fresh to watch.

Here are just a few of the features you'll love about our app:

- Stream your favorite shows and movies in HD quality, no matter where you are.
- Discover new content based on your viewing preferences and what's trending in the app.
- Get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history and ratings.
- Enjoy ad-free streaming and uninterrupted viewing.
- Create playlists and save your favorite titles for later.

So what are you waiting for? Download our app now and start watching the best short movies, TV series, and drama today!

Unless the user turns off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends. Otherwise, the system automatically extends the validity period. After completing the purchase, users can manage their subscriptions and automatic renewal in account Settings.

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

With state-of-the-art algorithms, StardustTV’s recommendation engine learns your viewing habits and preferences, delivering personalized content that truly speaks to you. Enjoy a bespoke viewing experience with suggestions that match your unique tastes.

Sophisticated and User-Friendly Interface
StardustTV’s interface marries elegance with ease of use. Navigate effortlessly through our extensive library with a design that is as beautiful as it is practical, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable browsing experience.

Flawless Streaming Performance
Indulge in high-definition streaming with virtually no lag. StardustTV promises a smooth, uninterrupted viewing experience, so you can fully immerse yourself in every moment of your favorite dramas and films.

The Premier Destination for Quality Viewing
For those who seek more than just entertainment, StardustTV is your ultimate destination. Dive into a world of compelling short dramas and films, and elevate your viewing experience to new heights with StardustTV.

Flare Flow:  Binge-Worthy Short Dramas in Minutes.

Tired of long, boring movies? Flare Flow brings you the future of entertainment: high-impact, bite-sized dramas designed to captivate you in minutes. Immerse yourself in a world where every second counts and every story leaves you breathless.

What Awaits You:

1.Exclusive & Original Stories You Won't Find Anywhere Else
Discover a vast library of constantly updated content. From heart-wrenching romance drama to edge-of-your-seat suspense thriller, we have diverse genres for every mood.

    "Mothering My Husband's Bastard": She nearly died giving birth, only to find her husband celebrating with his mistress. Now they want her fortune and her life. But they just provoked the wrong woman.

    "From Janitor to Mrs. Billionaire": She secretly married her boss… and now cleans his office. As his secretary bullies her daily, how long can she keep her explosive secret?

    "99 Charms, 99 Heartbreaks": Framed and left with nothing, a songwriter finds strength in a fake engagement. Will this new partnership heal her old wounds, or is love just another song she can't finish?

2.Crystal-Clear HD Quality & Seamless Streaming
Enjoy an unbeatable viewing experience with premium HD quality. Stream online smoothly, anytime anywhere, and get lost in the story, not in the loading screens.

3.Your Personal Drama Hub, Always Updated
We bring you non-stop fun with trending reels and drama hits. Get personalized recommendations for your next binge-watch obsession, with new cliffhanger episodes added daily.

Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Flare Flow their go-to for short-form drama.

Download now and start your next dramatic adventure! Free to watch.

Privacy Policy: https://flareflow.tv/policy.html
User Agreement: https://flareflow.tv/terms.html

TikTok is THE destination for mobile videos. On TikTok, short-form videos are exciting, spontaneous, and genuine. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a pet enthusiast, or just looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don’t, and you’ll find an endless stream of short videos that feel personalized just for you. From your morning coffee to your afternoon errands, TikTok has the videos that are guaranteed to make your day.

We make it easy for you to discover and create your own original videos by providing easy-to-use tools to view and capture your daily moments. Take your videos to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. 

■ Watch endless amount of videos customized specifically for you
A personalized video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.
 
■ Explore videos, just one scroll away
Watch all types of videos, from Comedy, Gaming, DIY, Food, Sports, Memes, and Pets, to Oddly Satisfying, ASMR, and everything in between.
 
■ Pause recording multiple times in one video
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. Shoot as many times as you need.
 
■ Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators
Millions of creators are on TikTok showcasing their incredible skills and everyday life. Let yourself be inspired.

■ Add your favorite music or sound to your videos for free
Easily edit your videos with millions of free music clips and sounds. We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, Edm, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

■ Express yourself with creative effects
Unlock tons of filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.

■ Edit your own videos 
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.

■ Support creators you love with channel memberships 
Join channels that offer paid monthly memberships and support their work (available in select countries).

About Subscription

Finally, here comes the place to watch original and popular shows, dramas and variety shows! WeTV presents selected and top-hit shows and dramas for you to stream with premium watching experience. 

New Experience! 
1. Newly designed media player with additional settings for bullet comment, episode selection, playback speed and others  
2. Support more speed options (3x, 2x, 0.75x) 
3. Picture in picture function 
4. "Coming Soon" and "My List" optimization
5. Support Vietnamese translation service and subtitles.  
6. Bug fixes

Other features you may like: 
Category selection: Movies, dramas, and variety shows are categorized into different pages. We make it easier for you to find a specific category that you want to explore more.
Continue to watch: We help you to remember where you left last time and pick up from there directly. 
Video definition adjustment: You can select different picture qualities based on your demand. When you are watching with cellular data, you may select 360P to save your data. You can also enjoy Blu-ray picture quality (Full HD) to upgrade the watching experience. 
Subtitles: We provide multiple languages and subtitles for you to choose from. You can also switch language based on your preference. 
Screen control: You can swipe your screen up and down with your finger to adjust volume and brightness and swipe left and right to skip back or forward the video.

Your feedback is valuable for WeTV. Whenever you encounter any errors or problems while using WeTV, please send us your feedback or comment to our email at service@wetv.vip to help us improve our service.

Automatic Subscription Service Description
1. VIP Subscription Benefits & Plans: Core benefit is ad removal for a seamless experience. Subscription plans include weekly and annual options; ad removal privilege takes effect immediately upon successful subscription.

2. Payment Process: Once you confirm the purchase and complete the payment, the corresponding amount will be charged directly to your linked iTunes account.

3. Auto-Renewal Rule: Your iTunes account will be automatically charged for renewal within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. If the payment is successful, your subscription cycle will be extended by one full renewal period (e.g., 1 week for weekly plans, 1 year for annual plans).

4. Subscription Management: To manage auto-renewal or cancel your subscription:Go to your iPhone’s "Settings" → Tap "iTunes Store & App Store" → Click your "Apple ID" → Select "View Apple ID" → Navigate to the "Subscriptions" section.To cancel auto-renewal, turn off the feature at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle. If you cancel within the final 24 hours of the period, no additional charges will be incurred after the current cycle ends.

5. Relevant Agreements:
a. Privacy Policy: https://puredramas.com/Privacy_Policy.html
b. Terms of Service:  https://puredramas.com/User_Service_Agreement.html

CubeTV — The Ideal Destination for Drama Lovers
CubeTV is a one-stop premium drama sharing and interactive platform designed for global drama enthusiasts. Here, you can immerse yourself in a curated audiovisual feast of dramas, discovering, saving, and sharing your favorite short films and cinematic content.

Core Features:
Rich Drama Library, Constantly Updated
We add new content daily across multiple genres, ensuring you always have something fresh to watch—no more drama droughts!

Smart Bookmarks & Personalized Recommendations
The platform intelligently sorts and recommends content based on collective user bookmarking behavior, accurately matching you with high-quality dramas of similar genres.

Personal Drama Collection
Create your exclusive "Must-Watch List," save favorite dramas, clips, or characters, and customize categories by theme or tags for easy revisiting.

Immersive Playback Experience
Featuring a full-screen, distraction-free interface with theater-grade visuals for a more focused and seamless viewing experience.

Check-in Task System, Earn Rewards While Watching
Daily check-ins and task completions grant platform rewards, unlocking member-only dramas, ad-free playback, and more for greater viewing freedom.

Dedicated Inbox & New Episode Alerts
A built-in notification center delivers instant updates on new releases and special events, while also making it easy to share feedback with us.

CubeTV: More Than Just Watching—It’s About Sharing and Exploring
Whether you love suspense, romance, historical, urban, light comedy, or quirky short dramas, CubeTV helps you quickly find content that matches your tastes, connecting you with global users in the world of drama.

Join CubeTV today and create your personalized drama universe!

developer: Nanjing Radiance Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
Welcome to ShotShort!

Tired of endless scrolling and not knowing what to watch? ShotShort brings you a whole new way to enjoy entertainment — with high-quality short dramas designed for your busy life. Every episode is just a few minutes long, so you can dive into captivating stories anytime, anywhere, without the long commitment. Whether you’re commuting, on a coffee break, or relaxing before bed, ShotShort makes it easy to fit great storytelling into your day.

A World of Genres at Your Fingertips
From sweet and heartwarming romances to intense revenge thrillers, suspense-packed mysteries, family dramas, and even fantasy adventures — ShotShort has something for every mood. Our content library is always growing, giving you endless stories to explore. Love dramatic CEO romances, gripping werewolf tales, or emotional urban dramas? We’ve got it all, ready for you in cinematic HD quality.

Fresh Stories, Non-Stop
We add new episodes and series every week, so your watchlist will never run dry. Our intelligent recommendation system learns your tastes and guides you to your next favorite drama effortlessly — no more endless scrolling, just instant entertainment you’ll actually enjoy.

Immersive Viewing, Anywhere
Crystal-Clear HD Quality – Beautiful visuals and professional production bring every story to life.
Multilingual Subtitles – Enjoy dramas from around the world, in your language.
Sleek & Easy Navigation – Find what you want quickly, with an interface designed for effortless browsing.

Free to Enjoy, Your Way
ShotShort is completely free to watch, supported by ads so everyone can access our stories. Want an even smoother experience? An optional small subscription lets you remove ads entirely and watch without interruptions.

Why Choose ShotShort?
- Episodes just minutes long — perfect for on-the-go viewing
- New stories added weekly to keep things fresh
- Smart recommendations tailored to your interests
- Genres for every taste, from romance to fantasy
- Watch anytime, anywhere — all in stunning HD
Step into a world where big drama fits into small moments. With ShotShort, you’ll always have a new story waiting for you.

Download ShotShort today and start your next binge-worthy adventure — no matter how little time you have.

About Subscriptions
Auto-renewing subscription instructions:
1. Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
2. Renewal: Your Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the subscription expires, extending your access for another cycle upon successful payment.
3. Cancellation: To cancel auto-renewal, disable the function in your iTunes/Apple ID settings at least 24 hours before the current subscription ends. If canceled within the last 24 hours, a renewal fee may still apply.
4. For more information, please see: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

The most talked about shows and movies featuring the worlds of HBO, the DC Universe, Discovery, and beyond.  
 
With HBO Max you'll get: 
• Access to thousands of TV shows and movies.  
• Exclusive, award-winning series that everyone's talking about — like the HBO Originals The Last of Us, Succession, The White Lotus, and House of the Dragon. 
• Stream select live sports from some of your favorite events, leagues and teams. Availability varies by country or region, plan, and by subscription provider. 
• The latest hits from HBO, Max Originals, Discovery, Cartoon Network, ID, DC, Adult Swim, and more. 
• Iconic favorite TV shows like Friends, Rick and Morty, 90 Day Fiancé, Looney Tunes, and more. 
• Family-friendly entertainment for the whole household.  
• Fascinating documentaries and unscripted series.  
 
Features: 
• Enjoy your favorite shows and movies at home or on the go. HBO Max is available on select TV, web browser, mobile, tablet, and gaming console devices. (Device availability may vary by country or region and by plan.) 
• Browse or search with ease across HBO, movies, series, genres, and brands.  
• Download shows and movies you love to watch offline with select plans. (Download limits vary by plan.)  
• Create personalized profiles for the entire household complete with customizable ratings, and profile PIN protection options.  
• Pick up episodes and movies where you left off on any of your favorite devices.  
• Find everything you love, all in one place, with My Stuff.  
• Watch on multiple devices at the same time. (Limits vary by plan.)  
• Stream high-quality video up to 4K resolution and surround sound including Dolby Atmos (where available) on select plans.
 
Content, sports and feature availability on HBO Max may vary by country or region. Sports, where available, may in some countries require a separate add-on which must be added to a base plan. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country or region. Language availability varies by country and region.  
 
You will be charged for your subscription on a recurring basis unless you cancel at least 24 hours before your next billing date. Your App Store account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period. When you cancel, you will have access until the end of your current billing period. You can manage or cancel your subscription by visiting the App Store app or Subscriptions under Settings on your Apple device after purchase. 

Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all countries or regions. HBO Max is only available in certain countries or regions.  
 
Terms of Use: https://hbomax.com/terms-of-use/
